Text:
I Am A Long Time User Of This Program !
**********************************
Shame looks to work ! But No it does NOT !
After 15 mins of use the screen clears and you have lost all your work, and you are advised to enter a serial number. You can not re use the crack . I have reverted back to version 7.5.0 .
Blocking using your host file does not stop it .
use it offline seems to work then just export it as html etc, Just don't publish it as that calls home!!
